name: 3.1.0-348.vaf5cd5c632ce
body:
<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
* Use HTTPS URLs in pom.xml (#18) @daniel-beck-bot
* Declare matrix-project a mandatory dependency it actually is (#17) @olivergondza
* added BUILD_RESULT to environment variables (#16) @azweb76
* [JENKINS-43637](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-43637) - Secures groovy script execution (#15) @dheid
* added an option to set the build to unstable instead of failed (#13) @ChakaZulu
* [FIXED [JENKINS-19954](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-19954) - fixing logic for axes builds (#10) @rpetti
* option to run postbuild scripts on matrix axe nodes (#6) @ndeloof
* [JENKINS-15395](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-15395) - Add checkbox to run script when build fails (#5) @kuppe
* Unstable builds should not fail when "Execute script only if build succeeds" is set to True. (#4) @simedw
* ivy dependency made optional (#3) @ndeloof
* Add an option to launch script only if build succeeds (#2) @castorpilot

## 📦 Dependency updates
